text: Ureueng nyang dilee nyang phon iseulam Nyang muhajirin asai di Makkah Ngon ureueng ansar nyang preh-preh Nabi Geubantu Nabi troh u Madinah Lom ngon peungikot bandum ureueng nyan Deungon niet gopnyan pih jroh sileupah Bandum ureueng nyan ka rila Tuhan Meunan pih gopnyan ridha keu Allah Keu gopnyan bandum ka Neuseudia Lampoh churuga nyang indah-indah Ie krueng dum ile di yup churuga Seulama masa sinan Neukeubah Nyan keumenangan nyang raya that-that Bahgia meuhat han ek tapeugah
